function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementing data backup and redundancy measures, encryption, and regular security updates.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular security audits, algorithm validation, and continuous monitoring of data access.","category":"Separate water facilities (toilets/bathrooms for contaminated)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementation of robust encryption and access control measures, regular security audits and updates to the framework.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement data verification mechanisms, cryptographic hashing of medical records, and regular integrity checks of stored information.","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementation of additional privacy-preserving techniques such as zero-knowledge proofs, continuous monitoring of identity systems, and strict data access controls.","category":"Managing drinking water safety measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular security updates and patches, independent security reviews of the encryption implementation, and adoption of additional encryption layers for enhanced security.","category":"Managing drinking water safety measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strict testing, and implementing secure coding practices.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Secure key management practices, multi-factor authentication, regular key rotation, cryptographic algorithm updates.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement rigorous encryption and decryption protocols, conduct regular security audits, and provide comprehensive strict access control and encryption protocols","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use digital signatures for data integrity verification","category":"Wall and floors redundancy and error-checking mechanisms in data delivery","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Standardize health information
